Main_Program module¶

Created on Thu Jun 17 10:20:37 2021

@author: matte

Main_Program.choose_API_file(is_online, nb_points, local_API_name)[source]¶

Choose an online or local API

Parameters

  • is_online (bool) – True or False, depends on the choice of the user on the web page.

  • nb_points (int) – Integer, depends on the choice of the user on the web page.

  • local_API_name (str) – The name of the local file, depends the choice of the user on the web page.

Returns

A dict with all the data from the API

Return type

dict

Main_Program.entry(is_online, display_points, nb_points, local_API_name)[source]¶

The Main function that runs the other ones and our modules

Parameters

  • is_online (bool) – True (online API) or False (local API), depends on the choice of the user on the web page.

  • display_points (bool) – True (display) or False (don’t display), depends on the choice of the user on the web page.

  • nb_points (int) – Integer, depends on the choice of the user on the web page.

  • local_API_name (str) – The name of the local file, depends the choice of the user on the web page.

Returns

Nothing, directly create the html file for the map.

Main_Program.get_API_data(APIfile)[source]¶

Get the data from the API file chosen

Parameters

APIfile (dict) – API dict with all its data

Returns

a list of coordinates and a list of str that represent the traffic status for each point.

Return type

list

Main_Program.get_area_data(area_names)[source]¶

Get the data of every area from the area folder

Parameters

areas_names (list) – The list of (str) names for each area.

Returns

A list of list of coordinates (one sublist for each area) and a list with all the data

Return type

list
